str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To do, perform, accomplish; be in any condition, i.e. I fare; I exact, require.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
